channel.title: [Client-Side] Editing default text color?
channel.description:
Alright, instead of writing a sendFrame over every piece of text to make it white, how would I go about changing the default text color in my client.
Regards, Zach.

if(s1 != null && s1.startsWith("@cr1@"))
{
s1 = s1.substring(5);
byte0 = 1;
}
if(s1 != null && s1.startsWith("@cr2@")) {
s1 = s1.substring(5);
byte0 = 2;
